name: Contribution
description: The Gate of Contribution - The power of individual contribution through creative expression

channel.name: Inspiration
channel.description: The Channel of Inspiration - A Design of a Creative Role Model

signal.script: Your unique contribution is needed precisely as you are. What would you express if you knew it mattered?
experiments: Create something that reflects your true style

friction.script: You're diluting your gift to fit in. Your power lives in your distinctiveness. Where have you made yourself smaller?
experiments: Express something you've been holding back
Say no to opportunities that require you to perform
Double down on what makes you different

breakpoint.trigger: Identity crisis around value and contribution
breakpoint.script: You're not losing your voiceâ€”you're finding a truer one. This silence before expression is sacred.
experiments: Stop producing and focus on being for a period
Explore new forms of creative expression
Study artists who transformed their style
